channel.title: The Website of William Huang on Hugo Winston
channel.description: Recent content in The Website of William Huang on Hugo Winston

item.title: First Clue
item.description: Clue We’ve come to the end of camp and the memories are fading Let’s thank all the counselors who spent these few nights _______ Answer Format The answer will be of the form “2022” + (the answer to the above clue).

item.title: USESO Scavenger Hunt
item.description: How the Hunt Works The hunt works in the following manner. This first page is going to give you a clue, which will lead you to the next url. To guess the next page, go to will-s-h.github.io/(the answer you think it is). If you are correct, the website should show the next clue; if not, you will get a 404 error. The answer will consist only of lowercase letters, uppercase letters, and numbers.

item.title: About
item.description: About Me I’m William Huang, an undergraduate at Stanford studying ???? and ????. A resume might be uploaded somewhere here soon. Fun Facts I’m a Warriors fan—not a bandwagon. The distinction is important to me. I’ve been a Warriors fan back when Oracle Arena was our arena. I’ve been a Warriors fan since I’ve been a Warriors fan since Monta Ellis was our best player. I’ve been a Warriors fan since the We Believe rag-tag squad topped the number one seed—okay actually I wasn’t a Warriors fan back then.
